dashboard-process-template:
<template name="PID-Master:!*!: Project (Team)" ID="PID/MasterRoot" defineRollup="no" dataFile="PID/master_root_dataFile.txt" constraints="{PID/Rollup}" > This node cannot be directly instantiated by the user. (The 'required parent' list of } enforces this policy.) They must instead instantiate a team project stub, and run the setup wizard to create an instance of this template.
We also change the 'allowed children' list to {PID/Rollup. This allows the user to create rollups under this node, but prevents them from adding any other type of children. Those children must instead be added using the WBS editor.
<html ID="sum" href="PID/team_summary.shtm" title=" Project Summary"/>
We alter the constraints to make this node immovable and uneditable. We also change the 'required parent' list to '}', which makes it impossible for users to instantiate this node into their hierarchy manually.
The old value for constraints was:
constraints="{PID/TeamNode{PID/TeamTask{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode"
<html ID="sump" href="PID/rollup_plan_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="sumq" href="PID/rollup_quality_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Quality Summary"/> <html ID="charts" href="PID/charts.shtm" title=" Analysis Charts"/>
<template name="PID-Team:!*!: Project (Team)" ID="PID/TeamRoot" defineRollup="no" dataFile="PID/team_root_dataFile.txt" constraints="{PID/Rollup}" > This node cannot be directly instantiated by the user. (The 'required parent' list of } enforces this policy.) They must instead instantiate a team project stub, and run the setup wizard to create an instance of this template.
We also change the 'allowed children' list to {PID/Rollup. This allows the user to create rollups under this node, but prevents them from adding any other type of children. Those children must instead be added using the WBS editor.
<html ID="sum" href="PID/team_summary.shtm" title=" Project Summary"/>
We alter the constraints to make this node immovable and uneditable. We also change the 'required parent' list to '}', which makes it impossible for users to instantiate this node into their hierarchy manually.
The old value for constraints was:
constraints="{PID/TeamNode{PID/TeamTask{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode"
<html ID="sump" href="PID/rollup_plan_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="sumq" href="PID/rollup_quality_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Quality Summary"/> <html ID="charts" href="PID/charts.shtm" title=" Analysis Charts"/>
<template name="PID-Team:!*!:Task" ID="PID/TeamTask" defineRollup="no" XdefectLog="false" dataFile="PID/team_task_dataFile.txt" constraints="{PID/TeamTask{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode}PID/TeamTask" >
<template name="PID-Indiv:!*!: Project" ID="PID/IndivRoot" defineRollup="no" defectLog="true" dataFile="PID/indiv_root_dataFile.txt" constraints="{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/}" > This node cannot be directly instantiated by the user. They must instead use the team setup wizard to join a team project.
<html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" title=" Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="size" href="PID/sizeForm.class" title=" Size Inventory"/> Project Quality Summary"/ --> Process Script"/ -->
<template name="PID-Indiv:!*!:Subtask" ID="PID/IndivFullNode"
usesRollup="PID"
defineRollup="no"
defectLog="true" dataFile="PID/indiv_full_dataFile.txt" size="New & Changed LOC" constraints="{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivReadOnlyNode}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode" >
<html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" title=" Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="top" href="PID/script.htm" title=" Process Script"/>
<html ID="Phase_script" title=" Script" href="PID/Phase_script.htm"/>
<phase name="" type=""
size=""
constraints="ED{}" GTACS_disabled_htmlID="_script"/>
<template name="PID-Indiv:!*!:Simple Subtask" ID="PID/IndivEmptyNode" defineRollup="no" defectLog="true" dataFile="PID/indiv_empty_dataFile.txt" size="New & Changed LOC" constraints="{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivReadOnlyNode}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode" >
<html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" title=" Project Plan Summary"/> Project Quality Summary"/ --> <html ID="top" href="PID/script.htm" title=" Process Script"/>
<template name="PID-Indiv:!*!:Subsystem" ID="PID/IndivReadOnlyNode" defineRollup="no" defectLog="true" dataFile="PID/indiv_empty_dataFile.txt" size="New & Changed LOC" constraints="MED{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/}" > We alter the constraints to make this node immovable and uneditable. We also change the 'required parent' list to '}', which makes it impossible for users to instantiate this node into their hierarchy manually.
<html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" title=" Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="top" href="PID/script.htm" title=" Process Script"/>
<template name="PID-phase:!*!:" ID="PID/PHASE/" dataFile="none" href="PID/_script.htm" constraints="ED{}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode}PID/TeamTask}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode}PID/IndivReadOnlyNode" />
<phase name="" type=""
size=""
imaginary="true"/>
<template name="PID-rollup:!*!:Rollup Data" ID="PID/Rollup" dataFile="PID/rollup_dataFile.txt" defineRollup="no" constraints="{}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode}PID/TeamTask}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode}PID/IndivReadOnlyNode" >
<html ID="sump" href="PID/rollup_plan_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Plan Summary"/>
<html ID="sumq" href="PID/rollup_quality_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Quality Summary"/> <html ID="charts" href="PID/charts.shtm" title=" Analysis Charts"/>
CMS.Snippet.Anonymous PID Team Root Tag PID Team Node Tag PID Master Root Tag PID Master Node Tag /PID/setup/summaryName.class
